message.content:
The Eiffel Tower is located in Paris, France. It stands on the Champ de Mars, a small island in the Seine River, in the heart of Paris. The exact address of the Eiffel Tower is:
2, avenue Anatole France, 75015 Paris, France
The Eiffel Tower is one of the most iconic landmarks in the world and is considered a symbol of Paris and France. It was built for the 1889 World's Fair and stands at a height of 324 meters (1,063 feet) tall, making it one of the tallest structures in the world at the time of its construction. Today, it is one of the most popular tourist attractions in Paris, attracting millions of visitors each year.
